Home → Events and activities → Regular children's activities

Regular children's activities

Most libraries run regular activity sessions and events for children of all ages, including songs, rhymes, stories, playtimes, crafts, clubs, reading groups and Minecraft clubs.

You can also check out our special events.

Filter by library:

Privacy & cookies

By using our site you agree to our use of cookies. Find out what cookies we use, how they affect you and how you can control them: our cookie policy.

Suffolk Libraries HMRC charity number is XT34476 and our registered company number is IP031542.
